description: Acyclic orientations of the Hamming graph (K_2) x (K_n).
comments: This number is equivalent to the number of plans (i.e. structural solutions) of the open shop problem with n jobs and 2 machines - see problems in scheduling theory.
references: H. Braesel, M. Kleinau, On the number of feasible schedules of the open shop problem - an application of special Latin rectangles, Optimization 23 (1992) 251-260
M. Harborth, Structural analysis of shop scheduling problems, PhD thesis, Otto-von-Guericke-Univ. Magdeburg, GCA-Verlag, 1999 (in German)
links: Structural analysis of shop scheduling problems (PhD thesis in German with English abstract)
author: M. Harborth (Martin.Harborth(AT)vt.siemens.de)
